title: New: Atom Tree – Body
body:
Scotland is on a roll right now in terms of producing top quality new music – with the likes of White, KLOE and Babystrange all winning plaudits.

Glasgow duo **Atom Tree** may well be the next outfit to find a sizeable audience, with their Bieber-esque electro-pop track _Body_, perfectly produced and no doubt destined to spawn a variety of club ready remixes. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our [On Repeat Playlist](https://open.spotify.com/user/crackintheroad/playlist/1UB6gJIZpmiO0H2zmSbg02) for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
